# load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
```
# import data
```{r}
exp1 = read_csv("exp1.csv")
nrow(exp1)
ncol(exp1)
colnames(exp1)
```
hist(exp1$rt)

# tidyverse verbs
```{r}
condition_data = exp1 %>% select(subject, rt, typeoftrial, trialcondition, correct) %>%
  filter(typeoftrial == "picture" &
           trialcondition %in%
           c("Heavy_Normal", "Light_Smashed", "Heavy_Smashed", "Light_Normal"))

means = condition_data %>%
  group_by(trialcondition) %>%
  summarise(mean_rt = mean(rt),
    sd_rt = sd(rt),
    mean_acc = mean(correct))
```
# exercise
```{r}
exp1 %>% select(dataset, correct, typeoftrial) %>%
  filter(correct == 1 & typeoftrial == "picture")
```
# plot
```{r}
condition_data %>% 
  
filter(rt < 25000) %>%
ggplot(aes(x = rt)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1000,
  fill = "red", color = "black", 
  position = "identity")+
  theme_few()+
xlab("RT (in milliseconds)") + 
ylab ("Count")+
ggtitle("Histogram of RT")
```
# our data plot
```{r}
means %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = trialcondition, y = mean_rt)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "pink", color = "navy")+
  theme_fivethirtyeight()+
  xlab("RT (in milliseconds)") + 
  ylab ("Count")+
  ggtitle("Barplot of RT")
```

#class exercises
```{r}
df = read_csv("relatedness_exp.csv")
part_df = df %>% select(ID, Type, pathlength, RT) %>%
  filter(Type == "Related" & pathlength %in% c(1,2))

mean_all = df %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(RT))
mean_part = part_df %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(RT))
mean_ID = df %>%
  group_by(ID) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(RT))
```
